events.title: Resonanzraum Rolle
events.subtitle: Live performance and recording at the house of Günter Rolle.
events.description: The session takes place in the space where Günter Rolle once built and played his instruments. </br>The house has its own tone and quiet history. We listen to how air, wood, and instruments react to each other.

events.title: Werkstatthaus Stuttgart
events.subtitle: Live session on resonance, movement, and listening.
events.description: Inside Werkstatthaus, sound and movement are explored together. Each small change of position shifts what can be heard. The session invites quiet attention and shared presence.
